name: Mill Muncher
description:
Controls

LMB Down & move cursor left & right to move the avatar.

Space Down to eat the munchie.

Background

I found a TikTok of a woman doing this IRL. I thought it would be fun to try & turn this into a game & I was right! It was a nice learning opportunity, but I'm not sure if the game itself is worth developing further. What do you guys think? Let me know in the comments. I've published a devlog of this to YouTube.
